website_summaries.verdict: Choose this washer if you want a roomy top-load model by a quality brand that can handle difficult loads of laundry. Its features, performance, and capacity are known for producing reliable results.
pros: User-friendly features include numerous wash cycles and Stain Boost function
Impeller's triple action is capable of tackling tough loads and dirt
Capacity is spacious and suitable for most consumers' needs
cons: A few consumers complain that the Deep Fill option doesn't work as well as they hoped it would

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE this new dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new dryer. Have had it a couple of months now. Dries much quicker, larger loads, quiet. the display is easy to use. My last washer/dryer combo (kenmore) lasted 25 yrs! Buying through Amazon was easy. The installer called the next day and we had the new washer/dryer installed within 3 days of order! The install and haul away worked great. We had already removed the door to the laundry room and moved the old appliances because we wanted to clean up the area really well, so install and removal only took the guys about 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: handyduo

customer_reviews.title: A great quality washing machine
customer_reviews.text: Many washing options for many different items make this an excellent choice for replacing our old machine. When the load is spinning, it goes so fast that it sounds like a helicopter above our house. It's not annoying, it only proves the quality of the machine. Simply add the clothes, add detergent, fabric softener (optional), and bleach (optional); then select the cycle, and you may adjust water temperature, soil level, and spin speed. I expect this machine to last many more years.
customer_reviews.author: taggman

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how it got out of quality assurance like this. It's awful
customer_reviews.text: This washer is the most loud I have ever heard. I live in a 5,000 sq foot home and could hear the washer in the basement and when I was outside. It's that loud. I returned the first one thinking it was defective and sure enough the 2nd one was just the same. I don't know how it got out of quality assurance like this. It's awful. I will be returning again. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B. Minihan

customer_reviews.title: Steam water line accessories not included
customer_reviews.text: We had an older Kenmore electric dryer so upgrading to the newer Kenmore was an easy decision. We never had the steam function on the old dryer so only after the new unit was installed that we found out that an additional water line was needed. Not a major problem as we can buy from AZ the necessary parts and DIY install. The problem was, it was very tight space and we were naive enough to believe that all necessary parts for hook up were included and provided by the installers. In addition, the installers came with a Ryder truck and were very rude and unprofessional. We are from Connecticut so your installer might be different.
customer_reviews.author: warbler

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good! Update-Almost 2 yrs!
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for advice on the best washing machine to buy. I have only used either agitator or front load washers. Based on what I could determine, this was a good choice. I have had it now for a couple of weeks and really like it. My clothes seem clean and everything come find out of the washer and dryer so, no complaints. I look forward to what I hope will be at least 10 years of good working order. Update-July 2020 Still loving this machine! Works great and is easy, efficient! Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: S. Salierno

customer_reviews.title: Broke 1 month after the one year warranty, and the repair guy who I have to pay didn't show up
customer_reviews.text: I had my washer fir a year it worked beautifully, I mean cleaned better than anything I have ever used. The steam option is amazing! Now heres the issue 2 months after the one year warranty it wont work at all, and im paying for someone to come look at it. I spent over$800.00 for a machine that lasted barely over a year
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best washer I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best washer I've ever owned. We use to have a fancy LG front loader that never seemed to clean our clothes and left a moldy smell with ever clean. I tried everything to clean our old washer with no solution. Our old front loader also was very loud and when it was spinning fast it shook our entire house. This new washer is much better in terms of cleaning and no more shaking our house. No more mold smell! I'm sold on the top loader!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great washer, Great delivery service
customer_reviews.text: It was the first time we ordered an appliance on Amazon and we did not know what to expect. The delivery service turned out to be great, was on time and they hook up the washer and hauled away the old one away for free. I washed clothes at different settings all day, we were back logged in laundry, and the washer so far is working fantastic. I would recommend this washer and deliver service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not the best washer I’ve ever had but I guess it’ll have to do for now. This machine doesn’t put out much water unless you push the deep fill button. I noticed soap residue on my dark clothes if I don’t put extra rinse cycle. Couple times I’ve noticed some dirt or debris left at the bottom of the washing machine after washing some dirty towels. Completely a pain having to reach down and wipe the dirt out. Overall I would not recommend this washing machine to anyone. For the price I expected much better. Completely dissatisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Momnochi

customer_reviews.title: Not so fast ——-
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. For a mid range dryer it is great. However, the delivery and hookup with all parts is not true. The dryer has a steam feature and making that work is left to the buyer. I would like to believe all parts and hookup should include all the features. Shame on me for thinking so, it cost you one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first! Purchased in July 2018. Loved all the features and was excited to use all the different settings and steam feature. By December 2019, it was taking longer and longer to dry. New year's day (2020) , almost no heat getting through. We checked the vent and it seemed ok. I can't see any customer support for this product now.
customer_reviews.author: andigibs

customer_reviews.title: Cleans clothes VERY well
customer_reviews.text: I really like this washer. It's very efficient and gets clothes really clean. I did follow the instructions carefully. It's an odd feeling at first. It runs so differently from the old style washers, but I'm very happy with it. My utility bill has gone down since I started using it.
customer_reviews.author: SifusWoman

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our decision to go back to a top loader washer
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this new washing machine. After many years using a front loader and dealing with the grimy seal it was time for a change. In reviewing top leaders we choose this Kenmore as it has an agitator and I felt that it would clean the clothes evenly and throughly. This machine works great our clothes come out clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: mamamia

customer_reviews.title: One day review
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this dryer for a day, but it has worked wonderfully. I’ve done about 10 big loads of laundry in the last 30 hours and this dryer has handled everything from sheets and beach towels, jeans, delicates and blankets perfectly. Read the manual to understand how to get the most out of it. I have not used the steam cycle yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was amazing! Fast, courteous and thorough!
customer_reviews.text: This washer is awesome! It is very large inside and I can fit twice as much as my front loader! The big win for us is that our clothes smell fresh! Some reviewers noted that the clothes wrinkled when washed and they do a bit, but I find those wrinkles come out when the items dry - air or in dryer. Please enter at most 100 characters. Please enter at most 100 characters.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get your clothes dry.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on this dryer before purchasing. Long story short, the automatic dry sensor is garbage. Every load has to be ran on timed dry which only goes up to one hour easily, then you have to click the “more time” button 40 times to get the max dry time of 1:40. Literally every load we run has to have this done, if not twice just to get clothes dry. Look elsewhere shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Jonh Q

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Broke after second wash. Wouldn't drain and only washed a small load of towels. Very disappointed. At least dealing with Amazon to return has been ok. Should have listened to ALl of the many 1 star reviews of Kenmore
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AFTER DEALING WITH MAYTAG BRAVO FOR 3 YEARS THIS MACHINE IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: REALLY APPRECIATE THE AGITATOR. AFTER DEALING WITH MAYTAG BRAVO FOR 3 YEARS THIS MACHINE IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Rose E. Noland

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it keeps going
customer_reviews.text: So far so good . Delivery was good but they were early and I wasn’t expecting them so it was a good thing I was home. Works great just hope it has longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Drying is quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Efficient and quick drying. Filter is easy to remove and clean. Instructions on features are very informative and make it easy to understand and apply each one for drying you clothes
customer_reviews.author: Libra woman

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Amazon Appliances Rock!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfied with product. Absolutely amazingly delivery and service. Amazon is the only was to buy major appliances for me now. Amazon to the moon. Long AMZN. Papa Bezos is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy from High School

customer_reviews.title: I was Leary about buying a washer from Amazon but they come through...
customer_reviews.text: Everything...Delivery...Set up and Test went off without a hitch. It has cleaned my cloths better than I've seen in ten years of working with the washer that was in the home, when I bought the house. You can adjust the water levels, etc. I have the one with the agitator, not ready to lose the agitator yet. I am well pleased with the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Latherbenson

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The machine arrived on the time agreed upon and it took about 15 min to bring it in, set it up, and take the old unit out. Machine is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Coventryhale

customer_reviews.title: Great Washer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this washer because of the large capacity capabilities, steam functionality, and price. The washer did not disappoint - I only have to do wash once every 2 weeks and my clothes come out clean. I also like that it is super easy to dump all of clothes into the top of the machine (sooo much easier loading vs the front loaders).
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I like it alot
customer_reviews.text: I just received it this morning the drum is large so I can wash the same type of fabric and colors at one time. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gina O.

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer
customer_reviews.text: This dryer is great only problem I ever have with it, is that it likes to go into energy save. If your not paying attention and don't take it off your clothes may not be dry
customer_reviews.author: jwkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues. I just use it normally no apps or anything.
customer_reviews.author: IBoughtStuff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME WASHER!!!!!!!!!! Simple controls, clothes are super clean. I'm VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Machine and Setup ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet machine, easy to use, home delivery was the Best!!!! Only way to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Choose your setting
customer_reviews.text: Energy saving low water fill or choose deep fill. Many options to choose from. Washer works great! Clothes get clean in any setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got a defective piece
customer_reviews.text: Bought in a deal on amazon. Machine will stop in between . Called Kenmore technician . He confirmed that it’s a defective piece.
customer_reviews.author: Rekha Balachandran

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon, you guys are the greatest.
customer_reviews.text: This top load washer is worth every penny I paid for it. It has so many functions,and we used them all, and very quiet. The delivery company did an excellent job on the set up for for us.
customer_reviews.author: Howie Jandrey

customer_reviews.title: A great washer!
customer_reviews.text: This machine has a great number of usable features and modes. Very quiet. Delivery and set-up were awesome. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William T Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase Quick and Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This washer is a little more complicated than the one it is replacing but we have learned the features quickly and really like the results so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine, very quiet. Door opens two ways! Lots of options in use
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to use but I like the fact the washer doesn’t run if the water isn’t turned on. Amazon delivery and installation were great.
customer_reviews.author: Family woman

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Washer
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean clothes well. Leaves lots of white residue on dark clothing. I should have gotten a front loader or the tried and true agitator washer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine B

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: Has eaten up my clothes and I cannot use anymore , need reapai
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great washer!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! The drum is BIG and the washer cleans my clothes good!!!
customer_reviews.author: LTkareon

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Froze at 20min cycle and stays non operational for nearly 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and easy to use.Great delivery and install.very smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Washer
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this washer for a short time now but it works much better than the last two washers we have owned. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I love this dryer. So much better than our old one. It works great. Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: jamie pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Best dryer I've owend so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and time will tell how good it really is.....
customer_reviews.author: J Fields

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great machine. Lots of useful features. I love the steam refresh option
customer_reviews.author: Amy Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: 30 hour review
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This machine is terrific! Have had it for exactly 30 hours. If you read the manual you’ll understand how it works best. And boy oh boy does it work! We just moved into the house last week and it seems I haven’t done laundry in about a month. I did all the accumulated clothing, plus all the packing towels, and 5 sets of sheets in a day. Everything came out perfectly. Love how large it is. Love how you get the countdown timer. Love the accelerated wash cycle. I have Not used the steam setting yet. I know It’s very soon, but I think I’m going to love this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy. Appreciated the prev reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to order . The delivery went very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W

customer_reviews.title: Only for the Elite
customer_reviews.text: Best washer on the market in my opinion. I had purchased a Maytag front load machine that gave up the ghost after 3 years. My brother let me use his Kenmore elite until I replaced mine, and I was hooked. The capacity is huge so I'm down to 3-4 loads per week with a large family. Having it delivered and installed through Amazon was a breeze, and saved us $80 over the local guys.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer One

customer_reviews.title: Immediately failed.
customer_reviews.text: Falsely claiming there is a venting issue. Does not heat up. Basically broken out of the box. Waiting on replacement.
customer_reviews.author: vincent bertolino

product_meta.title: Kenmore 62332 Electric Dryer With Wrinkle Guard Total Capacity, 7.0 cu. ft, White
product_meta.description: Size:7.0 cu. ft.| Color:WhiteThe Kenmore 7.0 Cubic Feet Front Load Electric Dryer was designed to make laundry day nice and simple. Whether you've got a pile of soaking wet towels or a delicate blouse that simply needs refreshing, this extra large electric dryer has you covered. With an extra large 7.0 cubic foot capacity, you can take on almost any sized load. From a light load of delicates to a mountain of towels or a duvet, this dryer can get the job done. With SmartDry technology, drying sensors can customize the heat to keep your clothing, sheets, and more looking brand new. The dryer ajusts temps and dry times for you. Spend less time babysitting your laundry and more time doing what you want with your day. For added convenience, the electric clothes dryer prevents wrinkles. The Wrinkle Guard option gives loads a quick toss to prevent set-in wrinkles for up to 40 minutes after the dry cycle for crisp, wrinkle-free clothing, sheets, and more. The convenient 4 drying temperatures and an air dry option makes it easy to get your wet towels, delicates, and linens dry. Auto Dry uses an integrated thermostat to monitor and control drying temperatures and moisture to prevent heat damage or re-drying for maximum efficiency on laundry day. Please confirm if you have a gas line or electrical outlet before ordering. The 7.0 cubic feet electric dryer from Kenmore measures 29" W x 28" D x 43" H.
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE DRYER: Provides 7.0 cu. ft. of drying capacity that can take on almost any sized load, including a bedding set to a load of delicates, and uses electricity for hassle-free drying
CUSTOMIZED DRYING: Dryer features SmartDry Plus technology to automatically adjust temperatures and times to help take the guesswork out of drying your laundry, like uniforms, towels, and more
PREVENTS WRINKLES: Wrinkle Guard option gives loads a quick toss to prevent set-in wrinkles for up to 40 minutes after the dry cycle for crisp, wrinkle-free clothing, sheets, and more
PROTECTS FROM OVER-DRYING: Auto Dry uses an integrated thermostat to monitor and control drying temperatures and moisture to prevent heat damage or re-drying
ELECTRIC DRYER DIMENSIONS: Measures 29" W x 28" D x 43" H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars165 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
